title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11ยง 25.1 - Original application and relicensing application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11ยง 25.1 - Original application and relicensing application

State Regulations

The form of an original license application and a relicensing application to act as a public adjuster pursuant to Insurance Law section 2108 is hereby prescribed as follows: individual or business entity. An individual or business entity may apply on the department's website or obtain an application form upon request to the department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11ยง
25.1

Amended

New

York State Register August 11, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 32, eff. 10/8/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
